analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders a ‘status confirmed’ SVG icon and exposes a customizable fill color via a prop.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable, configurable icon for indicating a ‘confirmed’ status in the orders module.

Components.name: IconStatusConfirmed
Components.responsibility: Renders the SVG markup and applies a fill color based on the `fill` prop.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declares component props and default values.

fill.description: Color value applied to the SVG `fill` attribute.

Dependencies: CSS custom property --black (for default fill color)
analysis.Usage:
Import and register `<IconStatusConfirmed>` in parent components. Example:

  import IconStatusConfirmed from '@/modules/orders/components/icons/IconStatusConfirmed.vue'

  // in template
  <IconStatusConfirmed fill="#28a745" />
Notes: No `<style>` block – purely presentational SVG markup.
Uses Vue 3 `<script setup>` syntax for lean setup code.
Default fill pulls from a CSS variable, ensuring theme consistency.
